author: stsp
msg: Add support for showing SSL cert details to svnauth.
This uses the serf library for SSL certificate parsing. Subversion clients
will only use SSL certificates if HTTP support via serf is present, so serf
is a reasonable dependency to use for this purpose.
(list_credentials): Show SSL certs with show_ascii_cert(). Use an iterpool
while looping over items in the creds hash to ensure that temp files created
